short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chatbot extension to do on-site search and answer user query.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐬 Dolphin Assistant – Smart On-Site Search and AI Chat Companion

🚀 Overview

Tired of wasting time searching for information on complex websites? Buried content, hard-to-navigate directories, and outdated on-site search engines can be frustrating…

Dolphin makes finding what you need a breeze. Just ask a question, and Dolphin will provide precise answers by deeply understanding the site’s content. Top search results will instantly guide you to the right pages, making your browsing experience smooth and effortless.

✨ What's the key features?

- Smart On-Site Search: Powered by advanced LLMs, Dolphin understands your search intent and delivers relevant, high-quality results that lead you directly to the information you need.

- AI-Powered Q&A: Ask questions, and Dolphin will instantly provide accurate, context-aware answers based on the website’s full content—no more endless scrolling.

💡 What value does it bring?

- Save Time and Boost Productivity: Dolphin eliminates the hassle of sifting through irrelevant content, allowing you to find information faster and more effectively.

- A Pleasant Browsing Experience: Turns a frustrating task into a smooth and intutive experience.

- Simplify Complex Sites: Dolphin transforms difficult-to-navigate websites into easy-to-use platforms, making information discovery effortless.

🎯 Who should use it?

- Professionals, Researchers, and Students: Anyone who needs fast, reliable information on complex websites.

- Anyone Struggling with Clunky, Outdated On-Site Search: If you've ever been frustrated by poor search results, Dolphin will help you navigate and find the right answers.

🚀 Getting Started

1, Click “Add to Chrome” and pin Dolphin for quick access.
2, Log in or create a Dolphin account.
3, Start your 7-day free trial—no payment information required.
4, Browse smarter with Dolphin Assistant!
